metadata.title: CVE-2023-28425 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Redis is an in-memory database that persists on disk. Starting in version7.0.8 and prior to version 7.0.10, authenticated users can use the MSETNXcommand to trigger a runtime assertion and termination of the Redis serverprocess. The problem is fixed in Redis version 7.0.10.

criterions.comment: redis package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
